name: Space Road
description:
Forward!

Important point !

➡ More than 20 levels!
➡ Special bonus levels!
➡ Compatible joystick controls !
➡ Addictive!



On the road to new Galaxy! In Space Road board your spaceship and land all the stars! A star number is required to unlock each level. For that you will surf on the walls of the space path while avoiding all the obstacles on your way while recovering the balls of precious energy to the obtaining of the stars!

You will unlock bonus levels that will change the way you play and test your ability to adapt and your SLR in space.

You will find on your way entities that will:
- Protect you all obstacles for a few seconds
- Slow down time and allow you to dodge obstacles with ease.

But be careful! Space can play you bad tricks [...]

Who will win the most stars?
